info.description: Extracts entities (e.g., people, organizations, locations) and facts (e.g., educated at, founded by) about these entities from natural language text.
info.title: Natural Language API

content.description: The text you'd like Diffbot Natural Language to process.

lang.description: Language of the text specified as an [ISO 639-1 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes). Review our supported languages for more information.

format.description: `plain text` for free text. `plain text with title` includes a title separated from the body by two line breaks (e.g. "This is a title\n\nThis is the body").

documentType.description: Optional. Provides context to the model and may produce better results.

maxNumberOfSentences.description: Maximum number of sentences for the generated summary.

customSummary.description: Define custom parameters for summary generation.

example.content: Diffbot is a startup based in Menlo Park.
Diffbot is a startup based in Menlo Park.

content.description: The text you'd like Diffbot Natural Language to process.

documentType.description: Optional. Provides context to the model and may produce better results.

maxNumberOfSentences.description: Maximum number of sentences for the generated summary.

customSummary.description: Define custom parameters for summary generation.

example.content: Diffbot is a startup based in Menlo Park.
Diffbot is a startup based in Menlo Park.

entityIndex.description: Index of this entity in the field "entities" (if requested)
Index of this entity in the field "entities" (if requested)

passage.description: One or more sentences where the fact was extracted from

records.description: Array of entities with attributes extracted from inputDocument according to the KG schema (https://docs.diffbot.com/docs/en/kg-ont-diffbotentity)

language.description: Language of the text specified as an [ISO 639-1 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

evidence.passage: Diffbot is a startup based in Menlo Park.
